doc: The pathname to the SDF file containing the chemical system to work with.
The pathname to the file where to print the resulting chemical system.

Lines defining the mutations. Each line must adhere to the following syntax:
 <String> <String>
 where the first string is a SMARTS query to identify which atom to mutate, and the second in the new elemental symbol to impose.
Sets the amount of log messages. Values larger than 0 will make the worker write more and more detailed log reports.
